ComicInfo.Title: Mirror Faces Mirror
ComicInfo.Summary:
Part 13 of “Worlds Collide,” the 14-part DC/Milestone crossover event, continued from Steel #7: Rift’s assault on the connected realities continues as the heroes and villains of Dakota and Metropolis scramble to build a new weapon. But they quickly realize that their best hope may lie in the survival of only one of the two realities. Concludes in Static #14.
WORLDS COLLIDE, part THIRTEEN! As the heroes and villians of two realities scramble to build a new weapon, they realize that only ONE reality can survive! Concludes in STATIC # 14
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-21 06:47:14. [CVDB39518]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Ivan Velez Jr., ChrisCross, ChrisCross, Ivan Velez Jr.
ComicInfo.Colorist: Michelle Wrightson, John Cebollero, Michele Wrightson
ComicInfo.Characters: Aquamaria, Boogieman, DMZ, Dogg, Fade, Flashback, Kwai, Masquerade, Rift, Third Rail, Wise Son
